creator: asf-bugzilla@sutoa.org
text:
Created attachment 33446
patch

bug51968 added some documentation that mentions the END flag which does not exist until 2.3.9, this was also pushed back to 2.2.

Patch to remove the confusing data from the 2.2.x branch is attached.

I do not read French much, the fixes in the .fr files are by pattern match with the English version and checking with Google Translate.
Thanks Daniel -- I applied the english changes to 2.2.x HEAD and sent a note to our french maintainer to check out the .fr changes.
creator: covener@gmail.com
